Name: Demon Strikes Back
About the game: Dungeon that never repeats itself： Every challenge is a brand new start, beat unexpected foes and you will never get bored! Reconstruct your village and empower yourself： Assimilate your foes' soul, and use them to reconstruct your once destroyed village, demon gets stronger with a home behind! Abundant equipment and relics： Discover powerful weapons and equipment empowered with magical skills and unique attack moves during your adventure, and use relics to gain unique characteristics! Unlock new skills： As the villages regains its former prosperity, more skill options would unveil to grant you a refreshing battle experience.
